page.title: 17Holiday Visitors
page.content: Yesterday,15th July,our class went into the village to do a survey among the holiday visitors.Although it was not a nice day there were lots of visitors about. We asked them why they had come to Princetown.Nearly half had come to see the prison, a third to see the moors, a few to have lunch and one or two to see the church.We also asked people if they liked Princetown and over half said yes, they liked it because it is quiet, small and clean and has a lovely view. The people who didn't like Princetown said it was too cold or too isolated.Although they didn't all like Princetown nearly everybody liked the moors.They said the moors were beautiful.We then asked people if they would like to live in Princetown.Some said yes but most said no, they wouldn't because the weather is so damp and cold.Cont'd
